_comment: Template configuration for Document Manager v2.4 - uses relative paths for portability
_instructions: 1. Copy this file and rename to settings_v2_4.json
2. Create the DATA folder structure (see below)
3. Configure your printer names if using auto-print features
4. All paths are relative - works for any user automatically
_folder_structure: Create this structure where you deploy the application:
_deployment_notes: OneDrive: Works from any user's OneDrive automatically
Network Share: Use UNC paths like \\server\share\DocumentManager
Local: Copy entire folder to C:\Apps\DocumentManager or similar
Database: Supports 2-3 concurrent users with WAL mode
Close app when not in use to reduce sync conflicts
